product.longDescription:
The Sonic lightweight carry on spinner suitcase weights in at just 7 pounds, and is easy to pack. The large interior compartment and exterior packing pockets offer plenty of room for everything you need for a 2-3 day adventure. Meeting most airline requirements for carry on sizing, the Sonic spinner suitcase makes travel a breeze with its ease of mobility and compact yet roomy style.

• Single airflow spinner wheels for smooth ride
• Expands 1.5"
• Easy grip soft molded kissing zipper pulls
• Integrated top, side and bottom carry handles for easy lifting
• Push button locking handle
• Large interior packing compartment
• Blouse pocket on door panel
• Interior modesty pocket
• Color pop cross-straps

Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airline. Go to AIRLINE CARRY-ON GUIDE for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.

• Weight: 7.1 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 20.25" x 14.0" x 8.0"
Overall Dimensions: 23.0" x 14.2" x 11.0"
product.shortDescription: Sonic Softside Carry On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this carry on has everything you need to make your quick getaway stress free and fun!
